CustomField.description: SAPE-9862 : Added this field re-request sap agreement number if the earlier request fails. This field will only be visible to the SEA support.
CustomField.formula: If( isBlank(SapAgreementNumber__c), Hyperlink('/lightning/cmp/c__RequestSapAgreement?c__quoteId=' & Id, 'Click Here', '_blank'), 'SAP Agreement Number Already Exists.')
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Click here to request SAP Agreement Number (Support use only)*
CustomField.label: Request Sap Agreement Number
